TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE in GPE . She was represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .

On DATE the applicant ’s daughter PERSON , born on DATE , was stabbed several times with a knife by her partner PERSON on a camping - site in GPE , where they had spent their holidays . N. died shortly afterwards .
On TIME of CARDINAL DATE the applicant was informed about her daughter ’s death by CARDINAL NORP police officers in GPE .
On DATE the Seine - Maritime Criminal Court convicted PERSON of manslaughter and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment .
Section CARDINAL , sentence CARDINAL of LAW , as far as relevant , provides as follows :

“ A person who suffered health damage within the area of applicability of this law or on a NORP ship or airplane as the result of a deliberate , unlawful attack directed against himself or against a third person ... receives on request compensation for the consequences to his health and economic situation ... ”

On DATE ORG rejected the compensation claims of another plaintiff who was informed in GPE that her CARDINAL children had been murdered in GPE on the ground that the crime had been committed outside NORP territory . On DATE ORG refused to admit that plaintiff ’s constitutional complaint without giving any reasons .
